title: Colour of the Month Golden Yellow
description:
In this Warhammer Painting video, we'll be looking at our Colour of the Month! This month it's Golden Yellow, and we'll be showing you the steps to get a brilliant and rich yellow for all your Warhammer miniature needs.         

If you're new to painting - check out our Citadel Colour Painting Essentials videos to learn all about it.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warhammer40000uk
